additional.message_body:
Hello Brandie,

Are you okay? I asked because we missed seeing you in class this week. Can you do me a favor? Please log into Blackboard and respond to the short week one discussion. It should only take 15-20 minutes to introduce yourself and write two sentences regarding the short video or article. That is it; you are done for week one. No need to wait until Sunday. Feel free to let us know if you have any questions.

Sincerely,

Dr. Meade and [personal_name]

Yes ma'am I am ok.  My schedule does not allow me to do my work until the weekends.  I attend [organization_name] because the work is not due until Sunday at midnight and that is the only way I could go to school.

Hi Brandie,


Thank you for responding to my email. 


Sunday before 11:59 pm is the final day to submit assignments. This means you can submit the work during the week, Monday-Friday, so that you are not stressed out trying to submit it on the final day.


To meet attendance, submit all work before 11:59 pm Sunday.










Sincerely,


Dr. Meade
